rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment uses neutral language without high-potency verbs, potent metaphors, superlatives, or critical alert phrases.
The segment discusses future action ('will also be suspended'), which is excluded by the Q3 table.
Segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports suspension of ostrich imports but contains no explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Describes a safeguard/response measure ('imports... will also be suspended') without active reassurance.
